name: python_tgbot_shop
description: * _free a person from work that is difficult for him to do - monotonous, constantly repetitive and boring_  * _save resources and personal time of employees_ * _consult on product availability_ * _instant response to user messages_ * _receive the necessary information 24/7_ * _promptly notify the user about product updates and the main news of the store_ * _increase sales_  * _track statistics_ * _save gadget memory for users_ <hr>
